name: The Ayes to the Right...
description:
Due  to a run of bad mistakes/bad luck, a vote of no confidence has been called against Boris Johnson. You have to collect the items that have given the Conservative party faith in Boris Johnson while avoiding the issues that have been a bit controversial... Or you can collect the controversial items and force him to resign.

Sound from freesound.com.

An audio clip from https://www.youtube.com/c/AFTVmedia

Audio clips from sky https://www.youtube.com/c/SkyNews

I do not own the rights to any of the images / photos.

This game was made as a joke to refresh myself on unity and scripting. It should not be taken seriously or as any kind of political statement.

Feel free to add comments of other items that can be added for the purpose of comedy only.
